bill_title: provide free admission to state parks and recreation areas for certain military personnel.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish, and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide free admission to state parks and recreation areas for certain military personnel. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-17 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any member of the armed forces of the United States and any member of a reserve component of the armed forces of the United States, including the armed forces reserve and the national guard may obtain free admission to any South Dakota state park or recreation area. The Game, Fish and Parks Commission shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 establishing criteria and procedures for obtaining free admission pursuant to this section. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
